title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When trying to use the 'Add Javadoc' feature from the context menu in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens. The expected behavior is that the action should add the Javadoc to the selected field.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu should add Javadoc to the selected field in the Type Hierarchy view.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view and right-click to open the context menu. 3. Choose the 'Add Javadoc' action.
